name: CineOtaku

features.name: Private Mode
features.description: Login or Register is required to access Details Page, Profile Page, and Dashboard Page.

features.name: Anime Exploration
features.description: Browse a vast collection of anime titles with detailed information like genres, ratings, studios, and more.

features.name: Search Functionality
features.description: Quickly find anime by title, genre, or related metadata.

features.name: User Watch list
features.description: Add and manage your personal anime watch list for easy tracking.

features.name: Responsive Design
features.description: Fully optimized for both desktop and mobile devices for smooth experience.

features.name: Dark Mode
features.description: Switch between light and dark themes for a comfortable viewing experience.

features.name: Authentication
features.description: Users can join the CineOtaku family by registering or logging in.

features.name: Authentication via Popup
features.description: Users can authenticate using Google or Twitter through popup-based OAuth.

description: CineOtaku is a web application designed for anime enthusiasts to explore, track, and manage their favorite anime series and movies. It offers a user-friendly interface to browse anime content, view detailed information, and maintain personalized watchlists.

name: Linea

features.name: Font are organized by categories
features.description: Easily browse and discover fonts based on different styles and categories.

features.name: Magic Search
features.description: More Faster your search with the help of AI.

features.name: Search Functionality
features.description: Quickly find fonts by name

features.name: Apply Box
features.description: add font on your apply box and use it on your project.

features.name: Store Box
features.description: Store your favorite fonts in your store box. Easily access and manage your preferred fonts for future use.

features.name: Theme Toggle
features.description: Switch between light and dark themes for a comfortable viewing experience. Currently working on Light Mode.

features.name: Playground
features.description: play with your font just like figma but it is on development phase.

features.name: Typography Guide Page
features.description: Learn the basics of typography, including font pairing, hierarchy, and best practices.

features.name: Font Details Page
features.description: View detailed information about each font, including styles, weights, and usage examples.

features.name: Responsive Design
features.description: Fully optimized for both desktop and mobile devices for smooth experience.

features.name: New Features Coming Soon
features.description: Stay tuned for upcoming features and enhancements to improve your font management experience.

description: Linea is a web application designed to help users explore, discover, and manage fonts from the Google Fonts library. It provides an intuitive interface for browsing fonts by categories, searching for specific fonts, and organizing favorite fonts into collections for easy access.

name: Markly Studio

features.name: Live Markdown Preview
features.description: Real-time preview of Markdown syntax as you type.

features.name: Clean, Minimal UI
features.description: A distraction-free interface for focused writing.

features.name: AI-assisted Markdown Generation:
features.description: Generate Markdown content using AI prompts.

features.name: Import from GitHub
features.description: Easily import existing README.md files from your GitHub repositories for editing.

features.name: Export Options
features.description: Export your Markdown files in various formats including .md, .pdf, and .html.

features.name: Responsive Design
features.description: Optimized for both desktop and mobile devices.

features.name: Theme Toggle
features.description: Switch between light and dark themes for a comfortable viewing experience.

features.name: Auto-Save
features.description: Your work is automatically saved to prevent data loss.

features.name: New Features Coming Soon
features.description: Stay tuned for upcoming features and enhancements to improve your font management experience.

description: Markly is a next-generation Markdown and README.md editor, previewer, and generator designed to streamline your documentation workflows. Create from scratch, edit existing files, or import directly from your GitHub repository. Our built-in AI assistant helps you generate clean, professional Markdown files instantly.

name: Bismillah

features.name: save your favorite names
features.description: save your favorite names in your favorite list.

features.name: Clean, Minimal UI
features.description: A distraction-free interface for focused writing.

features.name: AI-Reviews with name
features.description: Show details about the name with the help of AI.

features.name: Name with Audio
features.description: Listen to the correct pronunciation of each name.

features.name: Notification Reminder
features.description: Get daily reminders to reflect on a new name each day.

features.name: Responsive Design
features.description: Optimized for both desktop and mobile devices.

features.name: Theme Toggle
features.description: Switch between light and dark themes for a comfortable viewing experience.

features.name: New Features Coming Soon
features.description: Stay tuned for upcoming features and enhancements to improve your font management experience.

description: Bismillah is a modern Islamic web app designed to help you explore, memorize, and reflect on the 99 Beautiful Names of Allah ﷻ. Each name comes with meanings, benefits, and Qur'anic references, presented in a clean, minimal, and spiritually uplifting interface.✨ Whether you're seeking knowledge, comfort, or a closer connection to your Creator — Bismillah offers a guided, peaceful experience rooted in divine wisdom.
